divs: Sighting Detailswhile walkling up to get my brother up for work i looked up at the mountain range behind his house and seen five cigar shape ufo - the one in the center was the largest one the two on each side of it were a little smaller and the two on the side of those were a little smaller then those - while looking at them and knocking on my brother door i could see thru the door and see him getting out of bed and making his way to the door a - while watching these objects they faded in and out twice - the second time it faded back in it was extremely bright almost to bright to look at - they were standing upright horizontal - the size was huge - the one in the center was so tall it took away the natural arc of the sky - color was bright white with no sharp edges - i hope that makes sense - its the only way i can describe how big they were - well anyway thats my story -
trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were no other sightings in Los Angeles on or around December 14th 1979
